User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Important pages for search engines
Allow: /raccordement-enedis
Allow: /raccordement-definitif
Allow: /raccordement-provisoire
Allow: /raccordement-collectif
Allow: /modification-compteur
Allow: /viabilisation-terrain
Allow: /guide-raccordement
Allow: /nos-services
Allow: /contact

# Block admin and internal pages
Disallow: /admin
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /payment
Disallow: /debug

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://www.raccordement-connect.com/sitemap.xml

# Crawl delay to be respectful
Crawl-delay: 1
